channel.title: Google on Mark's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Google on Mark's Blog

item.title: Gemini In Brave
item.description: Learning how to ditch Leo’s collection of shit AIs (I’m looking at YOU Llama) in favor of a slightly less shit AI (Gemini).

item.title: The Flavors of Gemini
item.description: Gemini access methods, including the web app, API, and CLI, utilize distinct quota systems and billing structures. Each method operates with its own specific usage limits.
